SELECT A.* FROM( SELECT WEBTOON.* ,TO_CHAR(WEBTOON.IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24:MI:SS') AS IN_DATE_STR ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY WEBTOON.WEBTOON_IDX DESC) AS RNUM ,FILE_DB.SV_NAME AS SV_NAME FROM WEBTOON WEBTOON LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_DB FILE_DB ON WEBTOON.WEBTOON_IDX = FILE_DB.PA_IDX WHERE WEBTOON.WEBTOON_IDX IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY WEBTOON.WEBTOON_IDX DESC ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM( SELECT WEBTOON.* ,TO_CHAR(WEBTOON.IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24:MI:SS') AS IN_DATE_STR ,ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM WEBTOON WEBTOON WHERE WEBTOON_IDX IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY WEBTOON_IDX DESC ) A
SELECT WEBTOON.* ,FILE_DB.SV_NAME FROM WEBTOON LEFT OUTER JOIN FILE_DB FILE_DB ON WEBTOON.WEBTOON_IDX = FILE_DB.PA_IDX WHERE WEBTOON_IDX = #{webtoon_idx}
